title: Borders
body:
I have a question. I know that if i buy the ''event'' borders + summoner icon now i can get the skin later and still get the borders . My question is do if i buy the project skin borders now do i have to buy the skin while the ''event'' is on or i can buy the skin after couple months maybe even 1 year and still have my border ? 
Thanks

replies.body: Once you have that icon (which activates the borders) you can buy the skins at any point in time and still get the borders to show up! The only requirements are using the Project Skin and having that icon unlocked on your account.
